entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403231}Hey, Samurai. Mr. Tayama's expecting you{F801}at the Hills building.{F801}{F802}Oh, it ain't too far from Shibuya. Just{F801}head east and you'll see a skyscraper{F801}there.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403221}Until now, the Reds were the only thing{F801}keeping Shibuya propped up.{F801}{F802}But it's like a supermarket after a big{F801}natural disaster... All the demons are{F801}gonna come here, desperate for Reds.{F801}{F802}Needless to say, Shibuya's finished!{F801}M-Maybe we should flush all the Reds...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403221}Until now, the Reds were the only thing{F801}keeping Shibuya propped up.{F801}{F802}But now, Tokyo can say they've got the{F801}champ backing 'em up.{F801}{F802}Soon, Tokyo won't need the Reds anymore...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403203}Fujiwara sent a message to all the{F801}Ashura-kai troops...{F801}{F802}He told 'em to keep the Ashura-kai shops{F801}in each region open for business.{F801}{F802}It's like a supermarket after a natural{F801}disaster. We gotta stop people from{F801}panicking and fighting over supplies.{F801}{F802}No wonder Mr. Tayama kept his hands off{F801}the dude... He's some kind of big-time{F801}player.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403231}It seems Yuriko's been up to shenanigans{F801}lately, so we've decided to beef up{F801}security "out there."{F801}{F802}I'm headed there today myself, so I won't{F801}see you for a while.{F801}{F802}But don't go forgetting your mission{F801}to whack Yuriko...{F801}
